Reviews.Title: More is less
Reviews.Author: JRaynor
Reviews.Content: Buyer beware! Description of kit appears expansive, " 4 lenses!!!" but it's mostly uselfess filler. You only get two actual lenses, the other two are cheap lens expanders. The wide angle one doesn't work well as it encroaches on the field of view, rounding off the corners so the picture looks like taken through tunnel. The mini tripod is a joke, might hold up lens cap  but not the camera. The camera bag won't fit the camera with lens attached so is useless. So if you are tempted by "all the stuff" you get, you will be disappointed.Otherwise, the camera itself and the the two actual Cannon lenses work fine. Better get best price on items separately and get quality rather than quantity.

Reviews.Title: Adequate for a beginner.
Reviews.Author: The Don Vito "[OFFICIAL]"
Reviews.Content: I love this T3i camera and this is the kit I used to purchase it. However, I would suggest that you spend a little more to get a kit that includes the monopod and flash.  Then you will be truly ready to go.  You might want to spend about $200 on a better quality lens.Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II Camera Lens <<<--- This guy will help you get better starting images. ;)

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: Great bundle!!! Everything came on time and all accessories working great.  Package was properly set in box with packaging material.

Reviews.Title: No Brainer
Reviews.Author: MKBenjamin
Reviews.Content: $2600 worth of Canon EOS T3i products for around $1K? Plus a 32GB card instead  of an 8GB card like I've seen with others? I have to say, it's a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Madhu
Reviews.Content: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera bundle is very good(except bag). It is worth it. But that bag can be used when you carry only limited accessories. I didn't except all these items i could get for that price.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product... Outstanding Customer Service...
Reviews.Author: Semper Fi!!!
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for Christmas.  I am a Marine and stationed overseas, and she loved it.  It takes amazing pictures, better than any camera we have ever ownded.  The package was an amazing deal, and with all of the extra's it comes with how could you say, No?I did have one issue, the replacement battery was bad, I contacted Big Value, and they were a pleasure to do business with.  I will continue shopping with them for a long long time, customer service goes a long ways in todays world.

Reviews.Title: Satisfaction at its best...!!! Superb Customer Service.
Reviews.Author: Febish
Reviews.Content: Hai, I ordered this item 5 days ago & today I received the same (considering the fact that I belong to the far end of the world :) - Middleeast. In Oman to be precise)Anyways, for me this is an excellent & fastest order delivery & the package came with everything as advertised here.The Camera & the Lenses are of original quality (and came with the original warranty cards) & even the 32 GB Memory card is of Class 10 (superior quality & many of my friends had received Memory Cards of Class 2).I am yet to fully use the camera but still my instincts say that am gonna completely enjoy it.The extra battery which came with the package is slightly weightless comparatively with the original battery & hence I presume hte performance shall also be less. But, it doesn't matter since original Canon batteries are widely available in the market.The bag too is a bit of low quality (especially with the zipper) & balance of the items are okay.Hence, let me give 4.8 out of 5 for the product delivery.4 out 5 for the package.5 out of 5 for the camera & the lenses.Cheers...!!!

Reviews.Title: I am ready for my close up!
Reviews.Author: Keymaker
Reviews.Content: I could not be more happy with this camera package.  Now even this mere mortal can take Great Pictures!  All of the extra lens are quite handy, thought not of a very high quality.  The bag is really small and not much room for the camera body and one lens.

Reviews.Title: This bundle is not worth it.
Reviews.Author: GK
Reviews.Content: The Canon camera is great. The only other worthwhile items in this bundle are the extra battery and the SD card. The telefoto lens is an old Canon model without image stabilizer. The 2X telefoto and macro lens attachments, the camera cleaning kit with portable tripod and the camera bag are all junk! The filters are low optical quality. Don't buy this bundle. Just buy the camera and a more up to date lens and your own camera bag.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!!!
Reviews.Author: Jervoire
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle after looking everywhere else looking for these items separately.  I saved about $500.00 and I couldn't be happier with this purchase.  I recommend that everyone who is looking for a reasonably priced kit like this should buy THIS.

Reviews.Title: Not very great Addons
Reviews.Author: Raj
Reviews.Content: The 75-300mm lens is good buy32gb card is also okTripod is useless and bag is a jokeThe adaptor lens kits are not really worth-better spend money and buy a good lens

Reviews.Title: Great set!
Reviews.Author: MercuryTYTN
Reviews.Content: Love it! Bought this set for my budding photographer girlfriend.  She loves every thing in it! Except the bag which came apart in about a month. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Frankie
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my new cannon t3i camera...the only down fall was the camera bag is so small ..but overall the product and items it came with is well worth it ...thanks for sending my item on time.. I am happy with my product... btw they send it to you right on time tooo...

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal!
Reviews.Author: chowell726
Reviews.Content: This package arrived promptly and was packaged well. I love everything about this kit as it replaces my much older Canon 10d. The only items that were not very good in this kit were the 2x telephoto lens and the wide angle lens. But you definitely can not go wrong with this kit!

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i/600D
Reviews.Author: Roger Wagner
Reviews.Content: Received the full T3i/600D kit a few weeks ago.Camera is fantastic and working my way through the manual.A few  small gripes...- the tripod is total useless at 4.5 inches. Collapses under the weight of the camera.- the Case is not big enough to hold the camera & both lenses.- and while the extra lens is useful, there is often the need to swap for different requirementsBut on the whole... it'll keep me satisfied for years

Reviews.Title: Far beyond expectations!!!
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: I had purchased this camera at my local Best Buy store, but before I even took it out of the box, I came here to Amazon to see if I could find a better deal. Not only did I get a MUCH better price, the extremely comprehensive package of accessories that came with this kit gave me everything I needed (with the exception of a REAL Tripod)to jump right in to wonderful world of SLR photography!To top it off, when my package arrived (which was delivered quite quickly), I noticed that it was missing the extra battery. One email to the seller, and the battery arrived in short order, and I just can't say enough about my whole buying experience...one of the best I've ever had, and I HIGHLY recommend this kit to anyone looking for a quality SLR camera with all the bells and whistles!!!

Reviews.Title: Superb item
Reviews.Author: Booba
Reviews.Content: I really loved this product, its worthy for every dollar we pay.I am totally impressed by seller profile and the way they delivered the item in one day.Glad to be owner of such a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Above expectations great camera great package.
Reviews.Author: bacana00
Reviews.Content: Great camera and tha accessories pack is just complete. I recomend the product to all those who are in need of enjoying taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto!
Reviews.Author: Ennis Martinez
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, 100% recomendando, seriedad y compromiso en la entrega, los accesorios estupendos, calidad garantizada. Felicitaciones por la responsabilidad. Saludos!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Kit
Reviews.Author: RealtorDave
Reviews.Content: Top of the line products, carefully prepared for shipping, all items arrived safely. Complete comprehensive kit that contains all of the items that I was looking for. I would consider this kit one of the best purchases that I have made on-line.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: JRivera
Reviews.Content: Really great camera. Easy to use and good for a first time DSLR user (Thats me). The bag is marginal, but other than that this package is great highly reccomended.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i Kit
Reviews.Author: deerslayer11
Reviews.Content: I just received it today, it got here a day before the estimated delivery date. Ive used it around the yard some and am very happy with the purchase! I was happy to find that both lenses have autofocus.

Reviews.Title: This is a very good camera and kit.
Reviews.Author: Jlann
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It produces excellent results in an easy to use DSLR.The kit lens is surprisingly good. It is an excellent camera for an amateur photographerwho wants more control over camera setting choicesand it will also serve the semi-professional well.

Reviews.Title: Sweet set!
Reviews.Author: Christina Velez
Reviews.Content: Bundle came with everything listed and came in on time! I've used it a couple times and took it traveling. Pictures are great, easy to use, and the accessories came in handy a lot!

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: PHILLIP PARHAM
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to learn the use of it. It takes really good pictures and you got to have it.

Reviews.Title: this kit rules
Reviews.Author: Tiffianie LeBlanc
Reviews.Content: This kit was an excellent choice. you get so much for your money with it. I love it so much and use just about everything in the kit.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: B. B.
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera.  It is perfect!  The start up kit has enough lenses / filters for a beginner but not too many that overwhelmed me.

Reviews.Title: Good kit
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah L.
Reviews.Content: The first day we received the kit we played with it and the camera performed flawlessly. I would suggest a 50mm lens for low light.

Reviews.Title: first digital SLR after switching from 35mm film camera
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have ever owned, easy to operate and picture quality is A++++. Kit was a plus too.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera !!!! but not accessories
Reviews.Author: syed abbas
Reviews.Content: The Camera is Great, and also the Lens but the other accessories are of no use. Like the Extra battery doesn't get charged on the Canaon Charger. Lens, Bag and SD are of value.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: Posey
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera and since there have been newer ones released it is a great bargain. We purchased this for an aspiring photographer. She loves it!

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Ed R. Gade
Reviews.Content: A lot more than i needed for a starter but was cheaper than buying just the camera. look forward to learning and using

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy.  It is the best package out there if you want to get more usable products.  This gives you what you actually need and is fabulous quality.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Dunmyer "machquilter"
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal and has made a perfecf gift for our family. We are learning many new and exciting things about photography and our camera. Our pictures from Hawaii, basketball games and swim meets are turning out to be fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Camera is amazing, and even though the some of the add-ons aren't very useful the price is unbeatable.
Reviews.Author: Nicky A.
Reviews.Content: The camera is absolutely wonderful. The Canon lenses are great. However, like one buyer said the other "lenses" haven't really proved useful to me yet. I liked the "telephoto" lens because it gave a neat effect on some of the pictures, but that's about as useful as it got. The mini table size tripod is absolutely useless, though. Lol. It held up my Kodak Z5010 with no problems, but it didn't stand a chance with the Canon. Of course it's only included because it comes with the cleaning kit. The case hasn't given me any problems just yet. I can fit almost everything except one of the lenses in it at one time. One reviewer said that you couldn't even fit the camera with one of the lenses attached in the case. I'm not sure what case they got, but the one I got definitely let me fit the camera with a lens attached inside of it. Like I said I can fit almost everything except for one lens in the case at once.As the title of this review says, even though some of the add-ons aren't very useful the price is unbeatable. I priced this camera with the kit lens and an extra lens at Wal-Mart, and they wanted over $800. I don't remember if the other lens was a better lens or not, but I love this bundle. I feel like most of the lower-rated reviews were just overly nitpicky. This kit is definitely worth the price. You get a great camera with extras for less than what you would pay at a retail store.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Karas
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to use, and the pictures come out great! It came in on time, and easy instructions.

Reviews.Title: Nice package all in all.
Reviews.Author: barbolanero
Reviews.Content: Camera and lenses are as specified, however, the bag won't fit more than the camera and one lens. So be careful and get and extra bag if you like to take everything out. The adapters are okay, but no that great either. Filters are okay I guess and the cleaning kit is definitley useful. I reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: I Love IT
Reviews.Author: donna_cd5
Reviews.Content: I haven't used everything that has come with this camera yet but I am very great full that I do not have to go and search for all of the items that it came with.  Love the camera itself.  Takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and accessories...
Reviews.Author: Bang Bang
Reviews.Content: Works well, great product and accessories, recommended for limited budgets in the mid range for professional photographers. I prefer Canon over Nikon anyday but that is my opinion. Thanks...

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Jo D
Reviews.Content: great product for the price. everthing arrived together and in a timely manner. i would recommend to anyone. camera takes fantastic pics. and the accessories are wonderful and useful too.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected!
Reviews.Author: Jenni
Reviews.Content: This is a great starters kit. I am truly amazed at the sharp quality of the photos this camera produces.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera!
Reviews.Author: Marcie
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, I don't think that I use it to it's full potential. My only wish is that there was a bigger lens in the combo.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal
Reviews.Author: Jrod
Reviews.Content: This has been the best thing so far I have bought on amazon. The delivery was great. The only thing that I would say is that the bag is not of the best of quality and does not fit all of the accessories that it came with

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS T3i Digital SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Ann T. Miller
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic deal!  I am so excited to have bought this package of everything I need to become a much better photographer!  It has been easy to get the camera and lens ready to start shooting.

Reviews.Title: I Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: Ramon S.
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting to purchase a professional camera for a very very long time and finally I found a Great camera with a great price and great warranty. Up to this point I have no regrets purchasing this camera and look forward to purchasing accessories for my camera in the future. Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Pack
Reviews.Author: Axe
Reviews.Content: This pack is an excellent option if you are looking for an amazing camera.You get every thing you look in the picture for this awesome price.I really recomend it

Reviews.Title: As expected.
Reviews.Author: Terry Mills
Reviews.Content: On time, in perfect condition, with In Depth "How to" instruction manual included. It works very well as a Point and Shoot and for customizing your shot. Great quality for the price. Suprise, I was not expecting a second battery for the camera. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera bundle for the price. Love it.
Reviews.Author: Not Fifty Shades
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from an EOS rebel Camera to this and it was the best idea I had. This bundle has more then ANYTHING in any other bundle and the price was what made me look at it the most :)

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: R K
Reviews.Content: it was a good cameraexpensive compared to now as price dropped..i would prefer one bigger lens than two smaller

Reviews.Title: Bad memory card!
Reviews.Author: helpfulperson
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera the other day. everything was working fine, then the memory card which is  32gb transcend memory card that stopped working all together luckily i did not take a whole lot of pictures with my camera but still the ones i did have sadly where gone altogether. everything else is fine but that. I would invest in a different brand of memory card!!!! my rating would be 5 stars if that was different

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Steven Stein "steven13"
Reviews.Content: I have only had this camera for one month. I have used it a fair amount but not enough to make a great judgement of this product. So far I like it and have no complaints. I think that you can not do better price wise for what all you get. I looked at this same product bundle at Sam's Club and it was $ 849.00. So Amazon bet Sam Club price. I might give it a 5 star but it is still to early for me to give it a 5 star. The other camera I was looking at in comparson was a Minotla 50 to 80 series. The 50 series was older and 80 being newer is the only difference. The only reason I bought the Canon was the price and what all came with the camera. Monilta did not offer these other products with the camera and the price was about $ 700 without the other lenses bag, two batteries, charger, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great Canon T3i but not the accessories
Reviews.Author: Daniela Muñoz
Reviews.Content: I'm a flim producer and I love photography so for that reason I wanted this camera. This camara is great and the Lents are great too. The litter Lents there aren't a big deal you can used someday. The bag is horrible, like a lunch bag for kids and if you used with the camara and everything ... That is going to be a mess. Finally the cleaning kit with the tripod they send me that incomplete without the tripod. I sent 3 mails and I still waiting for that. Horrible.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i kit
Reviews.Author: Hamir Merchant
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent DSLR camera with many different manual features and options as well as auto focus feature. It takes some time to familiarize with all features, lenses, and filters.

Reviews.Title: Great pics
Reviews.Author: livedove13
Reviews.Content: I'm new to DSLR photography, and this camera is perfect for me. The kit, however, I'm not all that crazy about. Except for one extra lens, none of the products are Canon. The bag is not big enough for the camera and one extra lens. For the price, tho, I am extremely satisfied....I looked at the exact same camera at Sam's, with no extra lenses or accessories, and it was $100 more than what I paid for this kit! I would recommend this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very happy customer
Reviews.Author: Karen H "jkheater"
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything I expected and more. The pictures are beautiful and the the performance is top notch. Prompt shipping and received it quickly from the company with everything that was promised. I would highly recommend if you've been looking for a SLR!Very happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic deal
Reviews.Author: BKJ
Reviews.Content: I was really impressed with all the items that were included in the package.  The quality was very good.  Cant really think of anything bad to say about it.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
Free Shipping! Brand New w/All Supplied Accessories
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & Canon 75-300 f/4-5.6 III Lens 32GB Package
